description:
Write Terraform configuration for a VPC-based infrastructure on AWS:

- VPC with CIDR 10.0.0.0/16
- 2 public subnets (10.0.1.0/24, 10.0.2.0/24) in different AZs
- 2 private subnets (10.0.3.0/24, 10.0.4.0/24) in different AZs
- Internet Gateway for public subnets
- NAT Gateway in one public subnet for private subnet outbound
- Security group allowing SSH (22) from a variable CIDR and HTTP (80) from anywhere
- EC2 instance (t3.micro) in a public subnet using latest Amazon Linux 2023 AMI (use data source)
- All resources tagged with Environment, Project, ManagedBy=terraform

Include variables for region, instance type, SSH CIDR, and project name. Output the VPC ID, public subnet IDs, and EC2 public IP.
